Package com.challenge.pom

Class ShoppingCartPage

java.lang.Object
com.challenge.pom.Base
com.challenge.pom.ShoppingCartPage
public class ShoppingCartPage extends Base
This class extends the Base wrapper class and serves the same purpose, having this class it won't be necessary to modify the test in case something happens with current way to perform action. Also, this class main purpose is to wrap all possible actions that can be performed in the shopping cart page
Author:
Jorge Canario

    • ShoppingCartPage

      public ShoppingCartPage​(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
      Constructor class to instantiate.
      Parameters:
      driver - refers to the driver that will be performing actions. This class perform actions over a instance of a browser, that instance of the browser can be thought as the driver.

    • isShoppingCartFormPresent

      public Boolean isShoppingCartFormPresent()
      This methods verifies that the shopping cart table is present in the page
      Returns:
      a confirmation if the shopping cart table is there or not. True if it is and false otherwise
